The VeloxOS Stack

üöÄ

Core & Performance

  • Manjaro Base: Professional rolling-release stability.
  • CachyOS Kernel: Compiled with x86-64-v3/v4 optimizations for maximum speed.
  • CachyOS Repos: Access to performance-optimized system packages.
  • ZRAM: Intelligent memory compression enabled by default.
üõ°Ô∏è

Security & Privacy

  • LibreWolf: The ultimate privacy-focused browser (pre-installed).
  • Betterbird: A superior, privacy-hardened email experience.
  • Active Firewall: Pre-configured UFW protection from the first boot.
üéÆ

Gaming & Apps

  • Steam & Heroic: Ready-to-play launchers pre-installed.
  • CachyOS-Proton: Cutting-edge compatibility for Windows games.
  • No Bloat: Only essential tools for a clean start.

VeloxOS is designed to give you the best out-of-the-box experience without the need for manual tuning.
